title: Welcome to the Oasis, Please Login
description: No killer app exists to bring a mass number of people into the Cardano ecosystem utilizing Decentralized IDs.
solution: Create a 3D world that allows importing 2D or 3D NFTs built on Cardano as well as creating NFTs by creating objects in the 3D world.
experience: Plutus Pioneer, Indie Game Developer, Author of 2 Game Programming Books, Mixed Reality developer and instructor, SecondLife LSL developer
